src:
Frenkova ulica bo zaprta zaradi sanacije
06 Nov 2019, 10:49 by Uredništvo

Na Frenkovi ulici v Pobegih so začeli urejati odvodnjavanje meteornih vod na najnižjem delu ulice, ki v deževnem obdobju poplavljajo cestišče, delno pa se izlivajo tudi na bližnje dvorišče.



Fotografija je simbolična. 

POBEGI > V okviru del bodo vgradili talne rešetke s kanaletami, ki jih bodo spojili na meteorno kanalizacijo in znižali asfaltno površino na delu cestišča, kar bo omogočilo boljše stekanje padavinskih vod na bližnje nižjeležeče polje.
Zaradi del bo do prihodnjega petka veljala popolna zapora Frenkove ulice. Dostop za stanovalce bo urejen z regionalne ceste skozi zaselek Cikuti.
text:
Frank Street will be closed for remediation
06 Nov 2019, 10:49 by Uredništvo

The drainage of meteoric waters on the lowest part of the street began to be regulated on Frenkova Street in Escapes, which flood the roadway during the rainy season and partly spill over into the nearby yard.



Photography is symbolic.

Escape> The works will install floor grilles with canals, which will connect them to the meteor sewer and lower the asphalt surface on the roadway, which will allow better flow of precipitation water to the nearby lower ground.
Due to the works, a complete closure of Frank Street will apply until next Friday. Access for residents will be arranged from the regional road through the hamlet of Cikuti.
